name: Escape Room (Escape TR)
description:
language: english

-controls-

WASD - movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - look

E - to pick up / open

info

find the key! that simple but a tricky ghost teleports the key. when u got it u can see it on to top left corner. good luck.

note: no scary monsters no jumpscares just music. so dont be scared to play it.
